input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: college students
sentences: Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you'll be able to find the perfect teacher for your needs.
Looking to improve your language skills? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you can learn any language you want!
Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you can learn any language you want!

input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: comical, humorous

Audience: busy parents
sentences: Looking for a way to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you'll be speaking a new language in no time!

Looking for a way to connect with language teachers across the globe? Look no further than LangLang! Our app connects you with teachers from all corners of the world, so you can get the help you need to learn a new language.

Looking for a way to help your kids learn a new language this summer? Look no further than LangLang! This app connects you to teachers from all over the world, so your kids can learn in a fun, interactive way.
